system.effect:
Your Pokémon gain access to an additional table to spend Spirit from.
Bonus: Original Table Spirit Costs are reduced by 1 to a minimum of 1.

Name	Spirit Cost	Effect
Recall	Varies	        Use any move in the Pokemons Level-Up List. 1 Spirit for At-Will and EOT, 2 Spirit for Scene, 3 Spirit for Daily. This move cannot already be on its move list.
Baton Pass	3	When this Pokemon faints, it grants all CS stats to the next Pokemon.
Patched Up	3	Recover 50% max Hp and 1 Injury (does not count towards limit for the day)
Stolen Idea	2	Use Copycat or Snatch, ignoring Frequency
Perfect Skills	2	Your next skill check is a max roll
Intercept+	1	You resist the attack you are intercepting 1 step further.
Helping Hand	1	Use Helping Hand as if it was on your move list, ignoring Frequency and as a Free Action.
prerequisites: Master Intuition or Master Pokémon Education

ptu.prereqBackup: Mystic, Master Intuition or Master Pokémon Education
